title: Biden Seeks Calmer Supreme Court Confirmation Process in Outreach to GOP
sub_head: President says he is serious about Constitution’s ‘advise and consent’ as he meets with top senators
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden struck bipartisan notes Tuesday at a meeting with senators leading the Supreme Court nomination process, as the White House prepares for a confirmation that lawmakers say is shaping up to be less contentious than the hard-fought battles during the Trump administration.
Mr. Biden hosted Sen. Dick Durbin (D, Ill.), chairman of the Senate Judiciary Committee, and Sen. Chuck Grassley (R, Iowa), the ranking Republican on the panel, marking the formal, bipartisan start to the nomination process.
